column2: <START> As an ethnic Chinese living in SEA I am proud that China is hosting the winter Olympic games US opposition is sour grapes  Complaints on Human rights issue in xingjang is nonsense Hardly 00000000 of the people there care about the US or its antics which is declared to be America first anyway Just let us bear that in mind and dont expect anything from the US except destruction and death like in Iraq and Afghanistan
<START> I know why Money laundering authoritarian drug trafficking left wing politicians
